title.en: Prayer for Happiness and Well-Being Throughout the Land

text.en: To the guru and the Three Jewels, I pray:
text.en-trans: lama könchok sum la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that the rains may always fall on time.
text.en-trans: charchu dü su babpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that harvests may always be bountiful and livestock always prosper.
text.en-trans: lo chuk taktu lekpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that disease among human beings and livestock may be pacified.
Grant your blessings, so that the conflicts and famines of this age may be no more.
text.en-trans: dü truk mugé mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that enemies, bandits, and robbers may be subdued.
text.en-trans: dra jak chomkün zhiwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that there may be an end to frost, hail and drought.
text.en-trans: sé ser tenpa mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that happiness and well-being may reign throughout the land!
text.en-trans: gyalkham dé zhing kyipar jingyi lob
